content.raw:
I just looked at the plugin and saw this in there. You could mention this is what the plugin is doing, when I first read the tutorial I thought I, as a user, was expected to write a custom test.

Also, for a user seeing this here for the first time, it might be nice to briefly explain the variables shown here. Usually the tutorial will follow a step-by-step flow and not require the user to look for things in the source code. Don't be afraid to copy the whole plugin code here if necessary, and explain what each part of the code is doing, how the user can modify them to meet their needs and so on.
